tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had an accident operation around 7 years back, its start giving problem now, now mean from June, 2017. I was new to RR Nagar, So I searched a good doctor with good rating through Practo, I found a doctor with huge rating, So I went to that doctor, I treated there around 3 months wasted around 3K but no result, Finally he told me we will do operation and as I have insurance he quoted for 50K initially and stay for hospital for 2-3 days he told me final amount would be 80-90K.
So I ran away, ******* * **** ** *** * ***** *****, So I went to Dr. Nanda Kumar Bhairi, He was a humble and very polite and down to earth doctor. I treated there also for 2months, same no result i spend around 2K, then he also told me we will operation here only at his clinic as it is a minor surgery it will not take more than 20min, I did that with Rs 1800.00 only. There was an plastic tread was left inside from my first operation. He removed that through 20min operation. Now I am fine. Thank you Dr. Nanda Kumar Bhairi. With Due respect I will be really greatful to you Sir. ****** ** **** ****** ****** *** ***** ***** ****** ** *** *****
Regards
reply_text: Thank you for your feedback. We wish to serve you better in future.

review: I came to know about the doctor through my brother who got his son treated by Dr nandakumar bhairi who had fractured his leg has been operated 5months back he referred me here as I had severe kneepain since 20 years I visited  the doctor he explained me in detail about my knee pain he said it's severe osteoarthritis u need to go for replacement initially I hesitated and he gave analgesics gave us the time to discuss and again I decided to go with surgery now really I am happy I am thankful to the doctor he guided me throughout my treatment and is very free to speak and feels great and cost is also reasonable assistants in the clinic are also very much caring thanks to Dr nandakumar bhairi and team.I definitely suggest others to go ahead with his plan of treatment with 100% confidence. It's great to have such reasonable brilliant doctor in our area thank u sir for ur service.

Doctor is very friendly, calm, and gives you hope. He explained the issue very well, showing me my MRI, as well as diagrammatically explaining the anatomy.
Thanks to him, I have got a basic, definitive understanding of my issue.
Also, unlike many paranoid doctors, he does not scare you about the issue. He gives a lot of hope, and at the same time, pragmatic.
I would definitely recommend Dr Bhairi :) :)
reply_text: Thanks for your opinion it means a lot

review: doctor came at 1130 instead of 11, v had been there well in advance, took 2 xrays where literally the xray is blank, xray technician was horrible and was doubling up as cashier and receptionist  ,this gives a immpression. that the entire visit is in vain

I used visid Dr nandakumar when we were in RR nagar now I have shifted to banasavadi still I visit for any kind of ortho problem I had severe neck pain and I came to him as usual he is class he gave tablets I am alright within two days I became a fan of him I recommend all my family and friends to visit him once for any ortho problem.

I came for fever and severe back pain as I know the dr nandakumar since long time we visited 5 months back he found out as abcess in my back is been operated next day I became completely alright thanks for every thing I definitely recommend for my friends

I got hand injury I got fracture in 4th finger he operated on same day with k wire one and half month back he removed k wire and check x ray was taken bone is united in normal place he asked for some physio I am doing thank u I m pain free thanks for all staff for the care

I fell from two wheeler I was unable to move my hand I came to the doctor immediately Dr diagnosed as fracture of elbow bone operated on next day I am now able to do all activities surgery was done with less cost than expected thanks to all staffs for thre care I definitely recommend to my family and friends.

I got severe back pain after working at home I came to the dr with my sister he examined and took x ray immediately he advised to go for MRI as he suspected slip disc and we fallowed and MRI showed severe slip disc and he operated on next day and I became pain free thank u sir it's great to have u in RR nagar thanks for all the staff in clinic for thre care I definitely recommend my friends and family

I came to the doctor with my knee injury he examined and said there is a ligament injury asked to get MRI which showed the same what he suspected and he treated conservatively with crepe bandage and knee brace after few days he advised exersices I am feeling great I am happy that he treated without surgery in this commercial world he is the genuine.thanks for ur care and service.

I got severe back pain after working at home I came to the dr with my sister he examined and took x ray immediately he advised to go for MRI as he suspected slip disc and we fallowed and MRI showed severe slip disc and he operated on next day and I became pain free thank u sir it's great to have u in RR nagar thanks for all the staff in clinic for thre care I definitely recommend my friends and family

I had a fall in my garden immediately I was not able to move my shoulder I visited the doctor he took x ray and told us thre is fracture dislocation of shoulder and he reduced dislocation and put the plaster for the fracture it's one and half month now now he removed plaster asked me to do some exercises I am feeling pain free really I m thankful to doctor it's great that he did without surgery the staffs in the clinic are well experienced in ortho assistance I recommend my friends to the doctor

I got severe injury to my shoulder while playing I came to the doctor immediately he took one  x ray which showed dislocation of joint he reduced in  2 minutes and took one more x ray I was wincing with pain suddenly got big relief and he showed me clearly in x ray how the joint is relocated thanks to the doctor and staff for caring doctor was very cool and was giving confidence through out the procedure I definitely recommend to my family and friends.

I came for severe backche one month back was unable to sit and even sleep I came to the doctor immediately and he suspected slip disc and advised for MRI which showed severe slip disc and he operated next day and I got relieved by pain he is just incredible I will come for any ortho complaint to my family thank u sir and the staffs in clinic are also very polite and caring thank u all.

I am a regular patient for the dr nandakumar since long time he is the best today I got elbow injury and he diagnosed it as one of the elbow fracture advised for cast application we always trust his treatment thank u sirfor ur care tous I definitely recommend the doctor

I had a ankle injury due to fall and twist I came to the clinic Dr examined my ankle and asked for x ray he showed me the fracture line and he explained in detail about fracture treatment options and convinced us to go for plaster application now I m pain free walking with the plaster with wt bearing on leg nice to have such young and intelligent doctor in our place clinic staff are very cooperative I definitely recommend the doctor to my family and friends.

I had a fall and got hurt to my knee and I had been referred to the doctor nandakumar by my one of my friend and doctor examined my knee and he found out a ligament injury and asked for MRI scan the scan showed the same what he suspected then he advised me surgery of ligament reconstruction I went with surgery now I m feeling pain free thanks to the doctor for his complete care and thanks to the staff of clinic they are nicely spoken

I visited the doctor for my knee pain which occurred after a trauma and it has been diagnosed as ligament injury asked to get MRI and MRI confirmed complete tear of my one of the ligament and undergone surgery for acl reconstruction and advised some exercises now I am walking without pain and even I can run long distance thanks to the doctor for his complete support and treatment I am really happy all went well I definitely recommend for my known family and friends

I visited for my both leg pain after lifting heavy wt and he diagnosed it as my spine problem an advised physiotherapy for a week and given drugs and now I am feeling great I am back to work now a big thanks to doctor and staffs are good and rates are also reasonable I will ask my friends to consult the doctor for any ortho problems.

I came for my backache and RT leg pain doctor took his time examined my back and suggested x ray and through which doctor suspected a slip disc and advised for MRI which turned out as the same next day he operated now I am free with pain he advised a rest and asked for revieve after a month I am happy that I came to a good doctor I strongly recommend my friends and family.

Doctor was friendly and polite has taken his time and diagnosed as just a soft tissue injury and assured me about no ligament injuries and bony injuries prescribed some drugs and crepe bandage I am feeling better walking without pain I definitely recommend my family and friends.

First visited Dr Nanda for getting my mother's shoulder treatment, her issue was resolved within 3 days of visiting the Dr.

Last week met with an accident and had muscle catch, the pain was unbearable and was not able to sit, stand or walk.. again the Dr did the magic.

Would highly recommend people with orpthopedic issues to visit once to see the difference.

review: I visited for my Mom, she was having severe leg pain. Doc made us wait for long time even we were on time. Post visit when requested for a chat for few queries. no response whatsoever.He also prescribed a pain killer- injection for my mom ***** ****** **** **** I feel it was not worth the money and time. **** **** ** ********* ********* ** *** *** ********* **** ***** ******** ***** ******* *** ********** ** ********* ** **** Not recommending.
